event.description: Brian Roberts walks.
Adam Jones walks. Brian Roberts to 2nd.
Nick Markakis homers (4) on a fly ball to right field. Brian Roberts scores. Adam Jones scores.
Melvin Mora strikes out on a foul tip.
Aubrey Huff lines out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Ty Wigginton strikes out swinging.
Luke Scott flies out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Gregg Zaun called out on strikes.
Cesar Izturis grounds out, shortstop Jason Bartlett to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Brian Roberts grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Adam Jones hit by pitch.
Nick Markakis reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by first baseman Carlos Pena. Adam Jones to 2nd.
With Melvin Mora batting, Adam Jones caught stealing 3rd base, catcher Dioner Navarro to third baseman Evan Longoria, Nick Markakis to 2nd.
Melvin Mora flies out to right fielder Ben Zobrist.
Aubrey Huff strikes out swinging.

Luke Scott strikes out swinging.

With Melvin Mora batting, Brian Roberts steals (4) 3rd base. Nick Markakis steals (1) 2nd base.
Melvin Mora walks.
